description:
Add VM weights to instance_types and allow XenServer to utilize these.

Example of adding one:   xe vm-param-set uuid=<VM UUID> VCPUs-params:weight=<weight>
title: Add VM weights to instance_types

comments.content:
Add VM weights to instance_types and allow XenServer to utilize these.

Example of adding one:   xe vm-param-set uuid=<VM UUID> VCPUs-params:weight=<weight>

commit d6b6cc516232f8306df5c4527c7e12ac7b5fd785
Author: Josh Kearney <email address hidden>
Date:   Tue Oct 11 12:18:09 2011 -0500

    Adds vcpu_weight column to instance_types table and uses this value when building XenServer instances.
    
    Fixes bug 861776.
    
    Change-Id: I88b22b6959164e21a7150580d5f8da6920ed8610
